greenhouseid=#{greenhouseid},
baseid=#{baseid},
variety=#{variety},
plantArea=#{plantArea},
plantationMember=#{plantationMember},
technician=#{technician},
wages=#{wages},
startTime=#{startTime},
endTime=#{endTime},
remark=#{remark},
where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select ,u1.employeeName as plantationMemberName,u2.employeeName as technicianName, b.phoneNo as basePhone,type.greenhouseName as greenhouseType from sys_plant m left join sys_employees u1 on u1.id = m.plantationMember left join sys_employees u2 on u2.id = m.technician left join sys_base b on m.baseid = b.id left join sys_greenhouse g on m.greenhouseid = g.id left join sys_greenhouse_type type on g.typeid = type.id where m.id = #{id}
